dataCsv.Site_Description: The wreck sits on the bottom largely intact with a bow sprit, ship wheel, capstan, sheet winch or centerboard winch, pump, anchor windlass and one anchor deployed and buried and one on deck. While there are no masts or booms visible on site. There is a mast stub and pin rail, centerboard, and what appears to be a yard on the starboard side. The bow is curved and the stern is raked. There are several fish nets on the wreck.
